name: shred
description: Generate a custom share button plugin.

scripts.build: npm run build-debug && npm run build-min
scripts.build-debug: browserify src/shred.js -o dist/shred.js -s Shred -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ add-module-exports ] ] -p [bannerify --file .banner]
scripts.build-watch: watchify src/shred.js -o dist/shred.js -v -s Shred -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ add-module-exports ] ] -p [bannerify --file .banner]

author: Hiroki ISHIWATARI
